body: Hi Mostapha, I found the following problem with the 2 components: 1. use the 1st component to save the .HB file [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/0EqXjSuwdKXfrfaTiGK3uH6smK0H9x4ZO547n5LeRRZdtC3kzxtx73IhengpoBGx*lz2lyTWQE3DDSRXtl7Go9Bwr-EuN96Y/1.PNG) 2. disable the write HB file component [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/0EqXjSuwdKX91YEnF9vcNayKFm4OkhhCuiuQ8ajIoUznc8U5-ayzoipDZlqXN5t1EylGd0wm1yMDlz1tbsx*Vrc8Cww5Nc40/2.PNG) 3. save the GH file, close and reopen GH and Rhino, then open the GH file again, 4. the .HB file cannot be loaded by the 2nd component [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/0EqXjSuwdKX4pkJKvbrMEaC*NVgbw5Vo6TKIPKjJN37xONktcd0i7*IwMC*pYY4g4xjxbysVLnzeNHF6XUaGcMiCz*Y0M3di/3.PNG) it seems that the Load component only works when the write component is activated. Appreciate if you can kindly check if you can duplicate the error. Thanks!
